text.section:
If the exact amount of each item to be reported under subsection (a) of this section is not known by the pharmacy benefits manager at the time of its report, the pharmacy benefits manager shall offer to provide:
its current best estimate of the amount of each item; and
an updated report containing the exact amount of each item immediately after it becomes available.

section.section: A pharmacy benefits manager shall provide the information described in subsections (a) and (b) of this section if requested by the purchaser.

Notwithstanding the provisions of paragraph (1) of this subsection, if a pharmacy benefits manager requires a nondisclosure agreement under which a purchaser agrees that the information in subsections (a) and (b) of this section is proprietary information, the pharmacy benefits manager may not be required to provide the information until the purchaser has signed the nondisclosure agreement.
